name: pursocket
description: Type-safe Socket.io protocol library for PureScript

scripts.test: spago build && node --input-type=module -e "import {main} from './output-es/Test.Main/index.js'; main()" && bash test-negative/run-negative-tests.sh
scripts.chat:build: spago build -p chat-example && npx esbuild output-es/Chat.Client.Main/index.js --bundle --format=esm --platform=browser --outfile=examples/chat/static/client.bundle.js
scripts.chat: npm run chat:build && npm run chat:start
